    • Constructor Detail

      • Perceptron

        public Perceptron​(Perceptron[] inputs)
        A constructor for all perceptrons except first layer
        Parameters:
        inputs - The array of the perceptrons in the previous layer

      • Perceptron

        public Perceptron()
        A constructor for the first layer of the network

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        public void compute​(double input)
        A function to comput the output of all perceptrons not in the first layer. Does not take any inputs, will call the previous compute functions to sum all the outputs in the previous layer
        Parameters:
        input - A double value that is the data to be calculated on

      • sigmoid_prime

        public double sigmoid_prime​(double input)
        A function that implements sigmoid primve.
        See Also:
        Stack Exchange
        Parameters:
        input - A double value that represents the activation of the previous perceptron multiplied by the weight of the current perceptron and added summed with the bias
        Returns:
        A double that represents the derivative of the sigmoid function

      • train_weights

        public void train_weights​(double dCdivA,
                          double prev_weight)
        A function that recursively trains all the weights that went into this perceptron, called by train
        Parameters:
        dCdivA - A double value that is the dC/dw of the previous perceptron divided by the activation of this perceptron
        prev_weight - A double value that is the weight of link between this perceptron and the previous percetron (one farther down the line)

      • train

        public void train​(double expected)
        A function that recursively trains all the weights that went into this perceptron
        Parameters:
        expected - A double value holding the expected output of this perceptron
